speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm okay, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before I provide any details, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Can you also confirm your current address for security purposes?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I appreciate your cooperation. You currently have a balance of $250 due. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of that amount today.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. So, you'd like to pay $125 today. Would you prefer to do that over the phone or online?

speaker: Customer
text: I would prefer to do it online.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I will send you a link to complete the payment. Thank you for your time today.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day!
